summary: The code opens a headless instance of Neovim (nvim) using the script "nedit.vim". It also supports running Python 2/3, RubyGem, and NodeJS scripts within this environment.

details.comment: The code opens a headless instance of Neovim (nvim) using the script "nedit.vim". It also supports running Python 2/3, RubyGem, and NodeJS scripts within this environment.
